name: Warfare Royale
description:
Famine.io is an awesome new fast-paced multiplayer 2D tank royale thats free to play right in your browser! The object of the game is to destroy as many tanks as possible to earn points and get yourself to the top of the leaderboard.

How to Play

Use WASD or the Arrow Keys to move your tank.
Use the Mouse to aim your turret.
Use the Left Mouse button to fire.

Note: Different tank/turret variants each have different stats. Because these are balanced, only you skill can prove one class effective over another. Good luck!
